sys_remote_update_set.name: INC0120075-Supply chain vendor integration 10

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_e0e35180139ccb00cb92b7a66144b0c5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_ahho_supply_chai.MasterVendorIntegrationVendorUpdate</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>MasterVendorIntegrationVendorUpdate</name><script><![CDATA[var MasterVendorIntegrationVendorUpdate = Class.create();
MasterVendorIntegrationVendorUpdate.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
masterVendorIntegrationVendorUpdate: function() {
		var sysID;
		var vendname;
		var vendor = this.getParameter('sysparm_vendor');
		var gr1 = new GlideRecord('x_ahho_supply_chai_vendors');
		gr1.addQuery('sys_id', vendor);
		gr1.query();
		if (gr1.next())
			//query vendor name for sysid passed from client script
		vendname = gr1.u_vendor_name;
		//GP vendor master table
		var gr = new GlideRecord('u_gp_vendor_master');
		gr.addQuery('u_vendname', vendname);
		gr.query();
		if (gr.next())
			//fetching sysid for old vendor value from new vendor table
		sysID = gr.sys_id;
		return sysID;
	},
    type: 'MasterVendorIntegrationVendorUpdate'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sxUpadhyay</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-07-26 18:43:08</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>e0e35180139ccb00cb92b7a66144b0c5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>MasterVendorIntegrationVendorUpdate</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Supply Chain Request Management" source="x_ahho_supply_chai">2dd7dabb136aee0082857e776144b0a3</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Supply Chain Request Management">2dd7dabb136aee0082857e776144b0a3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e0e35180139ccb00cb92b7a66144b0c5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sxUpadhyay</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-07-26 18:43:08</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
